1.speaker: A
sentence: Why dose she look so sad?

2.speaker: B
sentence: Probably because i made fun of her. so you was upset.
아마 왜냐하면 나 놀렸어 그녀를. 그래서 그녀는 화났었어.

4.speaker: B
sentence: Gold digger. That's what people say.

5.speaker: A
sentence: I think you've got her wrong.

6.speaker: B
sentence: I think I'm gonna call her back and apologize.
내 생각에 나는 그녀에게 다시 전화할꺼야 그리고 사과해야지.
